description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url]
Simply Anounces who can Interact with a given world item on mouseover

You can both toggle if it should anounce what the interact does and the cooldown between messages.

Get my Dungeon Auras over at [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools]My Addon[/URL] alternativly you can import them seperatly at
[list]

respectivly[/color][/b]



Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]

comments.text: [taggeduser]@Rubyurek[/taggeduser] i can check how marking would work sure but i don't quite understand the 2. part of the question and how the 10 second protection makes no sense. You can scale that protection up to like 3 hours if you wished

Will there be the possibility to mark the items with marks in the future? That's exactly how the 10-second protection makes no sense. Telling them once in the chat and then preventing them would be great.
